about_the_game:
Pawn of the Dead differs from the classical chess with its unique mechanic: White pieces get infected into Black (undead) pieces when captured! But do not worry, there's always a solution to win in these asymmetrical levels.

As Leonard the White King, it's your duty to protect White Kingdom against the army of undead. Always nearby you is kingdom's most powerful warrior and your beloved wife, Elona the White Queen. A sinister reflection you ignored all along is awaiting for you, who seeks a resolution beyond revenge.

You can try the Random Level Generation mode in the Graveyard scene.

Welcome to the dark and cold world of White Kingdom...

content_descriptors.notes: The game depicts combat scenes, undead characters and a character with a half-burnt face
